attributes.action: Stop the proposed "pay as you throw" scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government is yet again penalising the consumer when it is the suppliers like supermarkets and large corporations that should be targeted to reduce their waste.  I for one am sick and tired of being targeted for things i have no control over.  They have tried these schemes before and failed miserably.  It's time to punish the comapanies not the consumer!!!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
